My Projects

Check out some of my projects...

StudyBuddy is a Chrome Extension that allows text to be directly copied from live meetings, videos and images! Built with TypeScript, React, Flask, NLP and OCR. Hack the North 2021 Finalist.

Github Project

Dockbox is a web application that allows users to collaboratively use a terminal together. Frontend built with React and Redux. Backend built with Go, Gin, and Gorilla along with a MySQL database. Deployed on AWS.

Github

Nova is a modern programming language built from scratch and written in C++. Implemented the Pratt Parsing algorithm, and took advantage of the Visitor pattern to create optimized and efficient code.

Github

SpikeWorld is a multiplayer 3D VR game that lets you play the sport Spikeball with friends all across the world. Utilized the Bing Maps API to generate 3D models of locations all across the world. Programmed the game with C# (Unity), and the backend in Node.js. Created for Hack the North 2020.

Github Project

SpaceHunt is a 3D open-world bounty-hunter game where the goal is to shoot the enemy spaceships. Created using Unity and programmed with C#.

Github

Created to help members of DECA to study and practice exams wherever they go. Designed to solve the problem of the lack of a viable study source on the app market. Used Android Studio & programmed in Java.
